title: MRW it's bad enough that my Support copycats the MF Support Worlds pick...
body:
...but still can't build a goddamn Sightstone.

{{champion:202}} : So I see you're copying Gorilla's MF Support crap.
{{champion:21}} : Yeah, u got a problem with that?
{{champion:202}} : Oh no, no problem. And I see you're also rushing the infamous Black Cleaver & Mortal Reminder sheep build as well...
{{champion:21}} : Yea, so?
{{champion:202}} : Welp, you're missing one more item that Gorilla built.
{{champion:21}} : Wuts dat?
{{champion:202}} : The Sight-
{{champion:21}} : stfu, dont make me report you
{{champion:202}} ...
{{champion:202}} : http://i.memeful.com/memes/wrQ5k6d.jpg

replies.body: I feel like the problem is less with support MF and more with not-actually-a-support MF - that MF player who picked it support thinking "yesss, I can finally play an ADC support" and just builds them AD/AP without any support items. I mean yeah, you're not gonna want to rush locket as Support MF, but you should still make sightstone...

We actually have a term for those types of supports!
" "Supports" ".
{{champion:99}} "I'm a support"
"They can't kill you if they're dead."
Reminds me of the Graves Support comic. "The best CC is death" xD
We already have an ADC support, {{champion:22}} , even if her secondary isn't "support" anymore.

I actually think Ezreal is a better ADC "support" since he has ASPD steroid and more AP damage (he can contribute a ton of AP poke from the support role, surprisingly?), if we wanna talk about who actually contributes to lane. AP MF Support works out for much the same reason, except instead of the ASPD steroid she brings Black Cleaver+ultimate synergy.

Random slightly triggering question: Has anyone checked to see if {{item:3116}}  is effective at keeping the enemy team from escaping {{champion:21}}'s ult?

PLEASE DON'T HURT ME! IT WAS JUST A QUESTION!
Nope, her ult is physical dmg. The abilities use must do spell damage as far as i know. Her only magic damage ability is her E which already slows.

spell damage =/= magic damage.

spell damage == damage done by a spell. It doesn't matter whether it's physical or magical... or at least last time I checked. If that's wrong, thanks Rito for more built-in misnomers. -.-

No, that's right.

Spell damage is just damage dealt by using a(n) spell/ability, regardless of the damage type.
doesn't her make it rain deal magic damage anyway?

I forget which name is which for Fortune's E and R (they're fairly interchangeable), so I'll answer both. :P

E: Scales with Ability Power only, and deals only magic damage.

R (And Q): Scales with both Attack Damage and Ability Power, but it deals only physical damage.
yes it works
Yep, the few times I decided to goof off with AP MF mid, Rylai's was generally my 3rd major ap item.
I did Support MF before it was cool

and when she actually had AP scaling on E?
coz I did that too, but AP MF got nerfed to the ground
She still does decent damage

as ap, only in the early game, but since her scalings are shit now, she can't keep up in mid and late game :(
ap mf in aram used to be so fun :(
Personally I think they need to just disable any champs used in World currently in a match in league to prevent stupid stuff like this from happening -.-;
Or balance Worlds differently.  That would be less detrimental to the rest of us.
Then we would be playing a different game. That would be a terrible idea.

The worst thing than a support not building sightstone is teammates who don't use their trinkets.

Which, imo, is likely more common and less noticeable.

Then again, I may be biased since I always build sightstone, so it's not like I have much chance to observe seeing others not build it sans enemy.

Also, how come the jungler is never pressured to build {{item:3711}} or sightstone as well, particularly tanks (do not cite the obvious exceptions like Master Yi!)? Aren't they supposed to sacrifice some carry ability to help the team out too?
Well I use that item on every jungle champ

I used to build Tracker's on Sejuani during the earlier Season 6 times and it felt so good getting more vision after green wards were deleted.

Eventually, I then realized that blue Smite is really good for augmenting your CC EVEN MORE FURTHER HAAAAA

Just hope the enemy team has Olaf jungle.

**Instant Counter.**

{{champion:14}} Hey man can I take some of your CS?

{{champion:236}}  For wards?

{{champion:14}} Yeaaahhhhh.... wards....

{{item:3812}} {{item:3078}}  {{item:3046}} {{item:3033}} {{item:3031}} {{item:3006}}
